note:
Interests: politics, economics, philosophy, social theory, environmentalism, technology, music.

Queries, Boosts and reciprocal input highly encouraged

name: General Content Warning
value: I have strong opinions but I am here to listen and learn. Please tell me directly if I make you uncomfortable, I do so accidentally, and I try to avoid harm/abuse with my choice of words.

name: Values
value: Compassion, compersion, consistency, conciseness, sustainability, desire to learn from mistakes, tolerance of mistakes, intolerance of persistent anti social behaviour, acknowledgement of diversity and affirmative action to increase individual autonomy.
